dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6548 IH: Professional Growth and Retention Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Duarte introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to provide local areas more flexibility in the use of funds for incumbent workforce training programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Professional Growth and Retention Act.
Section 134(d)(4)(A) of the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (29 U.S.C. 3174(d)(4)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking 20 and inserting 40; and
by redesignating clauses (ii) and (iii) as clauses (iii) and (iv), respectively, and inserting the following:

clause.text: Notwithstanding clause (i), with respect to a local area that had a rate of unemployment of not more than 3 percent for six or more months in the previous program year, as determined by the State, clause (i) shall be applied by substituting ‘50 percent’ for ‘40 percent’.
